name: Dimensions (asifZaman0362)
description: Dimensions is a short puzzle platformer made in 7 days during the community game jam 2019. You play as a 2D creature living in a flat world when suddenly you are approached with the oppurtunity to save your kind from machine oppression. Make your way through the levels in 3D space while only being able to see one cross section of the space at a time.
